alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 12:29PM MST until October 15 at 12:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 1229 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bapchule to Chandler Heights to near Florence Junction, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Casa Grande, Apache Junction, Florence, Coolidge, Gold Canyon, Sun Lakes, East Mesa, Queen Creek, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield and San Tan Village Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 170 and 188. US Highway 60 between mile markers 187 and 215. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 135 and 164. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
